thread.title: Range Rover spray painted with 'cheat' in 'revenge by lover' in Richmond | Metro News
thread.title_full: Range Rover spray painted with 'cheat' in 'revenge by lover' in Richmond | Metro News

author: Jen Mills For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Range Rover spray painted with 'cheat' in 'revenge by lover' in Richmond | Metro News
text:
Jen Mills for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 12:12 pm The car is worth £100,000 (Picture: David Sims/WENN.com) 
Someone has spray painted ‘CHEAT’ and ‘ROT IN HELL’ on a £100,000 Range Rover. Nurse left demntia patient on toilet in the dark and told her she was ugly and smelled 
The black vehicle, left on a driveway in the expensive London suburb of Richmond, has been covered in red paint on both side doors and the boot. 
It looks like the work has been done by someone in revenge for alleged infidelity, with the words ‘HEARTBREAKER’ scrawled across the back. 
There isn’t yet an indication of who the car belongs to or details of what led to the graffiti. (Picture: David Sims/WENN.com) (Picture: David Sims/WENN.com) (Picture: David Sims/WENN.com) 
Almost a year ago, a Range Rover was spray painted with ‘cheater’ and ‘Hope she was worth it’ in a previous incident in London last year. 
The white vehicle was left outside Harrods with the words ‘It’s over’ visible to shoppers. 
However, it was later revealed to have been a PR stunt and footage of it being painted was released. More
